segments.text: I can see by your resume here that you studied business administration .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So I wonder why you want to work for a newspaper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I did reporting for the university newspaper in my school.And I always be very interested in journalism .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But journalism , it is a very different profession from administration.You know a lot about administration.Why don't you choose to work for a company looking for managers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I study the administration.Yes.But I'm more attracted to writing articles . I want to use my knowledge of business to write financial news .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A new reporter must expect to work many hours .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know that starting reporters work many hours . I'm very willing to take on the challenge .
segments.speaker: S2
